children.name: Total number of builds
desc: The total number of builds listed in the GitLab Builds section.
Builds are individual runs of jobs. See the GitLab documentation for more details.

children.name: Total number of pipelines
desc: The total number of pipelines listed in the GitLab Pipelines section.
A pipeline is a group of builds that get executed in stages. See the GitLab documentation for more details.

children.name: Total number of failed builds
desc: The total number of builds with state failed for the project.

children.name: Failed builds 1 week
desc: The number of builds with state failed for the project during the last 7 days.

children.name: Failed builds 1 month
desc: The number of builds with state failed for the project during the last month.

children.name: Total number of successful builds
desc: The total number of builds with state success for the project.

children.name: Successful builds 1 week
desc: The number of builds with state success for the project during the last 7 days.

children.name: Successful builds 1 month
desc: The number of builds with state success for the project during the last month.
